actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

official_title: A bill to amend title 38 of the United States Code in order to extend specially adapted housing benefits to certain hemiparaplegic veterans.

summary.text: Authorizes the Administrator of Veterans' Affairs to assist any veteran, who has a permanent and total service- connected disability due to the loss, or loss of use, of both extremities in cases of hemiparaplegia, such as to preclude locomotion without the aid of braces, crutches, canes, or a wheelchair, in acquiring a suitable housing unit with special fixtures or movable facilities made necessary by the nature of the veteran's disability, and necessary land therefor. (Amends 38 U.S.C. 801)

titles.title: A bill to amend title 38 of the United States Code in order to extend specially adapted housing benefits to certain hemiparaplegic veterans.
